body:
Comment 1: 
Oh, obviously, it's NEON instruction, not FPA.

The comment in pkg/runtime/softfloat_arm.c is out-of-date ("ARM 7500 FP instructions").

We should prefer VFP over NEON instructions, and use AT_HWCAP (introduced in 2.6.23) to
choose the NEON functions at runtime.
(http://lxr.linux.no/linux+v2.6.33.8/arch/arm/include/asm/hwcap.h)
